title: Volibear Acrylic painting
body:
Did a painting of volibear on stream, not finished just yet! Painting the rest tonight. 
Just wanted to share some fanart. http://www.twitch.tv/shadowila If you would like to check the rest of the painting process out in a few hours, just join up :)

replies.body: :o I saw initial progress of this on your Twitter! This is coming out amazing!
Didn't know Riot watched me paint :P Thank you for the lovely comment

You did this same skin in charcoal a few weeks back.

Do you have a tumblr or some other site that you post to?

Hey sorry for the late reply :P I post them on twitter/Facebook 
www.twitter.com/shadowila
www.facebook.com/shadowila

replies.poster: V O I D B O Y
replies.body: {{champion:106}}  sucks, {{champion:26}}  is better, but other than that nice painting
Looks great! I like the texture on the fur and the smoke. :)
